name: Moving Boxes (Random Videos)
description:
Press R to restart the level

Blue box: you can just push it. You need to put every blue box into the blue box storage to get to the next level

Green box: you can drag it

Button: its a button

Door: it can be activated by buttons or by putting a blue box in the blue box storage

Spikes: one box came in the blue box storage and there are no more boxes left. That means you put every box in the blue box storage

Blue box storage: Only blue boxes can enter in it
